name: Takefusa Kubo
description: El lider de los Azon, tuvo que hacerse cargo del Imperio desde muy joven lo cual le ha hecho una de las personas mas resistentes del mundo
The leader of the Azon, being forced to take care of the Empire from a young age has turned him into one of the most resilient people in the world

abilities.name: BUFFSTATS V
description: Aumento de capacidad de combate a los aliados mediante la fuerza del coraje.
A boost to all ally's combat abilities by channeling one's conviction.

abilities.name: RAGE V
description: El usuario manipula su ira para subir su fuerza.
Users of this channel their anger to boost their brute strength.

name: Berhak Zhu
description: Estratega experto de Azon, su valia como general es tan alta, que ya ha sobrevivido a dos generaciones de la dinastia Azon, apodado el destructor en su juventud, en su vejez prefiere roles mas pacificos

Azon's top tactician, he has proven his worth as a general by surviving two Azon generations, in his youth, he was a famed warrior nicknamed the destroyer, now, in his elderliness he fancies a more peaceful approach

abilities.name: HEAL II
description: Un flujo de mana dirigido a las capacides regenerativas innatas del recptor.
A burst of magical energy that enhances the recievers regeneration.

name: Xin
description: Un asesino de Azon cuya lealtad va al mayor, nadie conoce su rostro debido a que quien lo ve suele pagarlo con su vida
An assassin from Azon whose loyalty goes to the highest bidder, no one knows how he looks since seeing him usually costs you your life

abilities.name: TRUESTRIKE III
description: Con punteria certera, esta tecnica da directamente en el cuerpo del objetivo, ignorando sus defensas.
A perfectly aimed hit that completely bypass the targets defense.

name: Azon Lancer
description: Infateria basica de Azon
Azon's basic infantry

name: Azon Shield
description: Tropa pesada de Azon
Azon's heavy trooper

name: Azon Medic
description: Medico de Azon
Azon's doctor

abilities.name: HEAL I
description: Un flujo de mana dirigido a las capacides regenerativas innatas del recptor.
A burst of magical energy that enhances the recievers regeneration.

name: Balista
description: La mejor tiradora de todo Ferten, solo conocida por el numero de su informe, su pasado esta rodeado de secretos; pero su punteria es clara como el agua
Best shot in all of Ferten, only known for her file id , her past may be dubious, but her aim isn't

abilities.name: BUFFSTATS III
description: Aumento de capacidad de combate a los aliados mediante la fuerza del coraje.
A boost to all ally's combat abilities by channeling one's conviction.

abilities.name: TRUESTRIKE V
description: Con punteria certera, esta tecnica da directamente en el cuerpo del objetivo, ignorando sus defensas.
A perfectly aimed hit that completely bypass the targets defense.

name: Dak Tulson
description: Antiguo miembro de un equipo de fuerzas especiales del ejercito Ferten que se gana la vida como Gangster en los bajos fondos de la ciudad de Permac
Ex Ferten Navy member that earns his keep as a Gangster in the bad part of the city of Permac

abilities.name: LEECHLIFE II
description: Una antigua tecnica vampirica que permite absorver parte del dano realizado a un objetivo.
This old vampiric tecnique allows the user to regain part of the damage inflicted upon the enemy.

name: Ferten Private
description: Infateria basica de Ferten
Ferten's basic infantry

name: Ferten Armoured Unit
description: Tropa pesada de Ferten
Ferten's heavy trooper

name: Ferten Surgeon
description: Tropa de apoyo de Ferten
Ferten's support trooper

abilities.name: HEAL III
description: Cura las heridas de un aliado
Heal an ally

name: Lavinna
description: Ha desarrollado teorias acerca de magia tan compleja que ni el resto del consejo puede llegar a entenderlos por completo.
She has developed theories regarding such complex magic that not even the rest of the council can fully comprehend them.

abilities.name: HEAL V
description: Un flujo de mana dirigido a las capacides regenerativas innatas del recptor.
A burst of magical energy that enhances the recievers regeneration.

abilities.name: LEECHLIFE V
description: Una antigua tecnica vampirica que permite absorver parte del dano realizado a un objetivo.
This old vampiric tecnique allows the user to regain part of the damage inflicted upon the enemy.

name: Ozna
description: Ozna cura a la gente de Kwin con su melodia, tanto es asi que algunas tropas llevan frascos con aliento de Ozna porque piensan que ayudaran a su sanacion
Ozna heals the people of Kwin with his melody, it goes as far as troopers carrying flasks with his breath because they believe it will help them heal

abilities.name: HEAL IV
description: Un flujo de mana dirigido a las capacides regenerativas innatas del recptor.
A burst of magical energy that enhances the recievers regeneration.

name: Kwin Destroyer
description: Mago de Kwin especializado en la magia destructora
Wizard from Kwin who specializes on destruction magic

name: Kwin Fortitude Wizard
description: Mago de Kwin que usa conjuros para mantener a sus aliados a salvo
Wizard from Kwin that uses spells to keep his allies safe

abilities.name: BUFFSTATS II
description: Aumento de capacidad de combate a los aliados mediante la fuerza del coraje.
A boost to all ally's combat abilities by channeling one's conviction.

name: Kwin Restorer
description: Experto en magia de regeneracion de Kwin
Kwin's regeneration magic expert
